formattedAddress: 235 W 76th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 235 W 76th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: We could not be happier with NYC Pooch! Our corgi puppy is on the anxious side and is nervous when strangers are in his home, but his walker, Tony, has become one of his favorite people in the world and we are so happy knowing that our lil guy is comfortable when we are at work! We love the photos and daily updates, it brings a smile to our face everyday we are in the office! Plus Tom and the staff are so friendly and flexible for any last minute needs or scheduling changes. Would absolutely recommend.

originalText.text: Highly recommend, we had a great experience. Our walker Soo was amazing and we absolutely trusted her to take care of our dog - we did house sitting with her too. Seeing how happy our dog was when he saw her, in report photos and after the walks was the best. The app makes it easy to communicate and the team are very responsive. We're moving and not sure our dog will forgive us for moving away from his best friend.

text.text: Highly recommend, we had a great experience. Our walker Soo was amazing and we absolutely trusted her to take care of our dog - we did house sitting with her too. originalText.text: We LOVE NYC POOCH! They are the absolute best. Our dog is our baby and we feel so comforted knowing he gets so well taken care of every day. We have lived in different neighborhoods in NYC and have continued to use NYC Pooch. We LOVE LOVE LOVE our current walker Aleysa. She is an absolute angel and our dog Cosmo loves her!!! She even picked him up from our wedding last June and dog-sat him that night. We love that Cosmo goes on walks with other neighborhood pups - he loves his friends! The email update I get every day is the highlight of my day - the photos bring us so much joy!! NYC Pooch is so reliable - they answer so quickly and are always available. They are also very flexible - if we work from home or go on vacation, they don't mind when we cancel our walks (with a reasonable amount of a heads-up). I really can't say enough great things about them. They're the best!!!!

originalText.text:
I have used NYC Pooch for the last few months since Maple was 8 weeks old. They have cared for her so well, sadly Maple and I are moving out of the city and will no longer get to partake in NYC Poochs wonderful services. I have used both the walking and sitting service and have always been left happy and not an ounce of worry. We were lucky enough to have a few wonderful walkers but by far Will was the best!!!

Thanks for all the great photos of maple having a great time and taking such great care of my pup.

Photo is from her last walk with Will, now that is one happy pup.

originalText.text:
NYC Pooch is the absolute best! We moved from Brooklyn to the Upper West Side a couple months ago and were nervous about finding a walking service for our 8 year old Rottie/Catahoula mix, Frank, who is not always friendly with other dogs and can be difficult on a leash (he's working on his leash manners!) As soon as we met Luis, we knew he would be in good hands. Luis is amazing and a genuine dog lover, he gives us daily updates (with pictures!) and even found a mellow dog buddy for Frank to walk with to help him with his dog reactivity! The team at NYC Pooch has been responsive and flexible with our schedules and accommodates any last minute changes we need to make. We could not be happier with NYC pooch, 100/100!

Update from my previous post: NYC Pooch continues to be the best dog walking service in NYC! Cannot say enough great things about our walker Luis. In addition to his genuine love and care for our dog Frank, he has been going above and beyond by actively working with Frank on his leash reactivity during his walks. When we first got Frank he could not be on the same block as another dog without lunging and barking. Thanks to the work and attention Luis has been giving Frank during walks, he can now approach smaller dogs while on a leash! When we adopted Frank we honestly never thought this would be possible. NYC pooch is the best and Luis deserves all the praise in the world. If I could rate 8/5 I would!
